body: implemented search feature by @Grodou, resolves request https://github.com/sealedtx/java-youtube-downloader/issues/92
spoof android client to fix throttling speed issue
fix extractPlayerConfigFromHtml

- fix playlist parsing: switch continuation to browse API
- fix subtitles translation
fix deciphering process
upload channel "uploads" feature, resolves #70 thanks to @Fabulierer
fixed bugs with fetching playlists #69
fixed playlist extraction (resolves #67)
playlists: add new regex pattern for extracting ytInitialData
fix bug with extracting ytPlayerConfig (resolves #62) thanks to @kangsLee

fix extraction of js url (resolves #59)
fix output file naming (resolves #56)
Fix author extraction for autogenerated playlists
Added cancellation functionality for async video download

- Download part by part for adaptive formats (resolves #48)
- Removed "java.util.stream" to support old Android
- Fix audio format parsing

thanks to @Grodou
add playlist support (resolves #33) thanks to @Grodou

- filter OTF formats;
- fix bug with extracting ytPlayerConfig (resolves #47) thanks to @Wittano
Add captions/subtitles extraction (#36)
Resolves #38, thanks to @kangsLee
fix bug with extracting js cipher functions, resolves #30

added retrieving HLS url for live videos (resolves #22)
thanks to: @poornerd

fixed parsing ciphered formats
thanks to: @Josemaralves

- set utf-8 charset for Extractor
- added videoQuality for AudioVideoFormat
- add async download with Future result

- added new function regex for deciphering
- improved api design

- fix regex to compile on android
- removed java 8 features to support older android versions

- refactored project structure to be easily extended from external
- added support for videos with signature (cihpered)
new video info parser

- bug fixes; 
- code style improvements;
